txt.en: You have been tasked with defeating the cold-drake blockade in Gundabad.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].\n\n'My scouts have returned from Kallamdâm. There within the old dwarf halls, the cold-drakes of the Frost-horde have erected a blockade of ice. This can not stand! We must make haste to Kallamdâm and show these drakes that Gundabad belongs to the dwarves!'
'Within the old halls of Kallamdâm, in Gundabad, cold-drakes of the Frost-horde erect a fortress of ice….\n\n'Your mission is to defeat the cold-drake blockade in Gundabad.'
Some monsters in this mission will apply a persistent cold debuff that can only be removed at bonfires found in the mission.
Your mission is to defeat the cold-drake blockade in Gundabad.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel.

'Well done! With the dreadful Hártung defeated, and the ice fortress no more, the old halls of Kallamdâm are once again safe. If we are to reclaim Gundabad, we must find and oust all of the Frost-horde!'
